website_summaries.verdict: A high-end putting mat that offers tremendous versatility and amazing performance.
pros: Includes an automatic ball return system so you don't have to pick up the ball each shot
Comes with 2 holes, and each hole is a different size
Offers an auxiliary line to help you train
Features a true-roll putting surface that replicates a golf course green
cons: Mat may have wrinkles that can be challenging to remove
Ball return system does not work consistently

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a golf lover
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son is obsessed with golfing and this was his favorite birthday present! Totally worth the cost! We bought extra golf balls which has proved to be beneficial because he does tend to lose them or his 2 year old sister finds them and hides them.
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: All three kids love to play this either on the porch or in ...
customer_reviews.text: All three kids love to play this either on the porch or in the living room. Uses real golf balls too They have definitely improved their putting. Great for a rainy day! Folds up to push under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for your golfer husband!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. He really loves it! As I walk into my bedroom only to catch my husband playing golf while watching golf in the bedroom! Lol. It was so funny! Since then I have seen him use the putting green many MANY more times. I got it for his birthday and he said it was just what he wanted he just didn’t know it, haha :) I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to purchase a putting green with ball return!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mayer

customer_reviews.title: ... loves this and I do too for practicing putting easily at
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and I do too for practicing putting easily at home
customer_reviews.author: JLove

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the two options of putting holes... the one with the guideline is great for my daughter learning to play golf.. Construction is what was expected, turf seems to hold up and not matt down. I'd recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joel S

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids, dad loves practicing on rainy & winter days when you can’t hit the course
customer_reviews.text: Great to practice your putting on rainy and winter days. This is not just for kids! I gave to my dad who is golfer. When weather is bad, it’s nice to to just practice when you can’t hit the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the 2 holes. With one hole being smaller. It really helps aim
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a golf enthusiast for Christmas and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good practice mat but some wrinkles do not level completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, this is my first putting set but I like it, the grass mat feel similar to the artificial grass I had in my backyard . What I like best is the long putting mat, by looking at the picture thought just like the other I see in store, when I unroll it, its actually much longer than expected. Other than that nothing really special, gravity feed return system, at least no moving parts, you don't have to worry about breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Wesau

customer_reviews.title: and very good quilty to keep it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for friends house warming party and he likes it! Not too big use a lot of space, and very good quilty to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: siyan

customer_reviews.title: Still a nice product to keep makeup tools
customer_reviews.text: One of the handle got broken at arrival. Still a nice product to keep makeup tools..
customer_reviews.author: Nam Phung

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush holder so much I have 2 of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush holder so much I have 2 of them...the larger one and the smaller one. They are very well made and look so nice sitting on my vanity. They keep the dust off my brushes keep them organized for easy use daily. I think the price is quite affordable as I searched a long time before settling on these. I'm glad I purchased both of them....I keep my eye brushes in the smaller one and my face brushes in the larger one and it works out great
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this makeup organizer. The package was delivered fast and the product was wrapped up ehich was nice because nothing was broken nothing was broken. It looks beautiful its a great addition to any bathroom or vanity.
customer_reviews.author: I love IH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Has the perfect amount of storage space, just wish you could choose the color of pearls. I went to michaels and got some white ones and now it looks great on my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pisha

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Perfect size, durable and keeps brushes and beauty blenders dust free. Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good indoor fun activity. Bought this for office and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: First thing i notice when i opened it, was the great quality. Its a most have. i currently dont have makeup brushes but you can definitely use it with other things, as i did. It has made me more organize. The Rosy Pearl have made it look more fancy. Make everythimg look cute. I have my things in order. Its also for a great price. i am very satisfied with my purchase. Such great product would definitely recommened to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: david krainiak
